channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Victor Bahlangene
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Victor Bahlangene

item.title: Project 1 : Borough and Neighborhood for a New Movie Theatre
item.description: Determine a new location for a movie theatre in New York City. We do this by exploring the following: Richest borough Population data of New York City Busy entertainment area Fewest number of theatres in the borough (ie low competition) Of the five Boroughs in New York, which is the richest(highest income) Link to Github Repository Link to Blog post
